entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT] System.Linq.Expression.Tests.Expression_Tests.TestCallStaticMethodsByName - add rd.xml #69928
  • [API Proposal]: Add `.All` and `.Any()` for bool collections in System.Linq.Enumerable #69925
  • Way to get more detailed statistics about runtime unmanaged memory overhead? #69924
  • [6.0] HelloWorld singlefile app does not run on arm64 macos on SDK 6.0.203 or newer #69923
  • SqlBytes.Stream should consider overriding Span Read/Write methods #69921
  • [API Proposal]: Expose a high level authentication API #69920
    7.0.0
  • Developers can leverage Edit-and-Continue on Windows ARM64 #69907
    7.0.0
  • Delete `doesFieldBelongToClass` #69900
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add APIs for COSE signing #69896
    7.0.0
  • LoggerMessage generator generates invalid code for a parameter #69893
  • Consider caching Utf8JsonWriter and PooledByteBufferWriter on a thread static in JsonSerializer.Serialize #69889
  • ARM64 - Prepare for the future #69887
    .NET 7.0

Closed

  • Crossgen2 crashing on SPCL #69926
  • Mono Browser wasm Release failures on runtime rolling build #69850
  • [NativeAOT] Issue with expressing a Expression<Delegate> in a RD.xml file #69875
  • DateTime parsing on WebAssembly broken after trimming in latest .NET 7 main #69891
    7.0.0
  • `TypeLoadException` for `System.Runtime.Experimental` and .NET 7 Preview 4 #69903
  • Blazor WASM AoTing ClosedXML/DocumentFormat.OpenXml fails #69898
  • create-mibc with spgo on Linux #69607
    7.0.0
  • Implement Edit-And-Continue ICorDebug API's for ARM64 .NET Core #69904
    7.0.0
  • Regex Source Generator doesn't react when removing the attribute invocation causing it to break the design time build. #69880
  • JIT: inconsistent handling of GT_LCL_FLD in value numbering #12142
    Future
  • Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) when calling Managed function using C# #69862
  • [wasm] Build libclang in dotnet/llvm-project for arm arch #65961
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Display parent's members on getProperties #68542
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [Release/6.0] Fix singlefile bundle alignment on OSX ARM64 #69930
    area-Single-File
  • [release/7.0-preview5][wasm] Backport fix for runtime test failures on CI #69929
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: allow pinvoke calli helper in TreatAsShouldHaveRetBufArg #69927
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add hot/cold splitting test job to jit-runtime-experimental #69922
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Rooting `GT_COMMA` nodes for `GT_RETURN` nodes, then hoisting them to statements #69918
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete `GT_INDEX` #69917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Pin thrown exceptions during EH. #69916
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Android][test] Enable mandelbrot-7 on Android x64 with interp #69915
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][doc] Update Android NDK version to r23c #69913
    os-android
  • Remove more wprintf usages #69912
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Rev .NET 5 to net6.0 or $(NetCoreAppCurrent) #69911
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve Encoding.UTF8.GetMaxByte/CharCount perf #69910
    area-System.Text.Encoding, 7.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Fix invocation of finally clauses with tiering enabled #69909
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • PoC: support custom X509ChainPolicy in SslStream #69908
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Support long pdata unwinding and save_next for floating point regs in ARM64 #69906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Handle mis-sized structs in ARM/64 `PUTARG_STK` codegen #69905
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not add x86 host to PATH on 64-bit machines #69902
    area-Setup, 7.0.0
  • Fix ICorDebugFunction2::GetVersionNumber for arm32. #69901
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Bug fixes from dead code elimination #69897
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete an old quirk from `gtSetEvalOrder` #69894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update CentOS7 image #69892
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Convert MissingMemberException.FormatSignature to managed and shared #69890
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix StreamReader EOF handling and improve perf #69888
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Explicitly include mscorlib.dll, to support scanning assemblies #69886
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Some cleanups in Native AOT suspension area #69885

Merged

  • Fix state buffer length in OdbcHandle.GetDiagnosticRecord #69914
    area-System.Data.Odbc
  • [wasm] Disable runtime test failing due to stack overflow #69863
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove CORCOMPILE_IMPORT_SECTION #69881
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] enable the promote feature. #69840
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Do not recost and rethread trees inside `optRemoveRangeCheck` #69895
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Adding analyzer/fixer for the Regex Source Generator (#68976) #69872
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Implement fake hot/cold splitting and corresponding stress mode #69763
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • A few tweaks to regex source generator comments / naming for lookbehinds #69773
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Don't pin managed collection objects when the contents are non-blittable. #69696
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Cleanup a few more allocations in X.509 #69831
    area-System.Security
  • Deleting field sequences from `LCL_FLD` and `VNF_PtrToArrElem` #68986
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Fix flags usage on Linux #69874
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Display parents' members on GetProperties. #68907
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Make `interp_to_native_signatures_count` static #69867
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono

Updated

  • Pin char when UTF-16 marshalling is specified and runtime marshalling is disabled #69837
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Creating comma temps differently for SubMulDiv morph #69770
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Release/6.0] JIT: fix interaction of GDV and boxing (#60355) #69630
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add support for symbolicating traces via XHarness #66226
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: defer some flow graph reordering until after loop recognition #69878
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Stream.ReadAtLeast perf regression in DataContractSerializer #69879
    area-Serialization
  • Add support for delegate GDV and method-based vtable GDV #68703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable server-side OCSP stapling on Linux #69833
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Optimize better with maximum array length #69735
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Relax the address exposure condition in forward substitution #69818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Ubuntu 22.04 to libraries CI run #67345
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Adding support for vector constants via GenTreeVecCon #68874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Aggressive GC #69695
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement get bytes from loaded_files using debugger protocol. #69072
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Refactoring the generic-math CreateChecked/Saturating/Truncating APIs to match API review #69756
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • CoreCLR support for default interface implementation of static virtual methods #66887
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Implement PemEncoding.WriteString #69877
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Fix diamond pattern encountered with static virtual interface methods #69738
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [MONO] Factor marshal-lightweight out of marshal-ilgen #69208
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Resumbmit tar feedback changes, include Android build fix #69469
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Convert Valuetype.FastEqualsCheck and GetHashCodeOfPtr to managed #69723
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Implement LoadLibraryErrorTracker #69842
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make SString typed on encoding #69748
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugging] Adding instructions for native debugging #69873
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on Node.js #68807
    area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: Faster long->int overflow checks #69865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [Android] Fix app crash when using non-native HttpClientHandler #69565
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • Keep native order of get members call from Type #69506
    area-System.Reflection
  • Move off preview onto regular Windows 11 client images #69871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm][debugger] Added support for getting members of static structures. #69542
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [QUIC] Latest msquic interop #69876
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Provide the invalid value in the number parsing FormatException message #67415
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger]Fix entrypoint breakpoint when it's an async method #69856
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Process WebSocket connection errors on NodeJS #69858
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fixes #64159 - JsonSerializerContext source generation fails with keyword identifiers #66876
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, source-generator
  • Speed up Convert.ToBase64String() #69884
    community-contribution
  • [Draft] Fix hard link creation in tar tests in Android, iOS, tvOS #69416
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Hoist the invariants out of multi-level nested loops #68061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove Or, And, Not + related fixes #69839
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [draft] [wasm] JS Marshaler based on code-gen and [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add fallback root certificate bundle #25686
  • Project-level default for await configuration #25685
  • Building net*-android apps always restore Microsoft.NETCore.App.Host.linux #25679
  • Workload update reports failure when manifest packages aren't found on feed #25678
    6.0.4xx
  • With .NET 6.0.301 installed, the sdk version for Maui/wasm-tools is displayed as "6.0.300" in dotnet workload list. #25673
  • Error "Unable to find package about 5.0.18" when creating 5.0 project on VS 17.0/17.2 VAL build which carries 5.0.17 runtime #25672

PullRequests

Created

  • Add fallback root certificate bundle for code signing and timestamping #25687
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Try out pre-downloading the test packages on the helix machines #25055
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adds default outputProperties Item #12030
  • Implement functionality for templating workload and version constraints #25505
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25650
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Implement new flag for ignoreing apphosts in dotnet run #25647
    Area-CLI

entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: "Closed" enum types #3179

    10.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [BrokenLinksH2] Fixed the link path #6179

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Getting Speculative SemanticModel for method body method declaration without body (block or expression) is impossible #61564
  • Improve error recovery for explicit implementation lacking return type #61563
  • CS1591 CodeFix does not work correctly when there is anything but OpenBraceToken #61562
  • Make `NormalizeWhitespace` cancellable #61561
  • Annoying behavior when applying lightbulbs: scrolling to caret location after applying a fix (32526.111.main) #61560
  • Immediate Window has a data acquisition fault #61558
  • Option to prefer `new()` over `var` in assignments. #61557
  • [Feature Request][Interpolated Strings] Add option to automatic add a $ when write a " #61556
  • "Extract Method" introduces an invalid nullability annotation that results in a nullability issue in the extracted code #61555
  • Multiple matches for the interface member warning is not reported static members #61553
    C# 11.0

Closed

  • "..."u8 prefers byte[] when it should prefer ReadOnlySpan<byte> #60644
    17.3
  • Subword selection does not work in "Go to all" #61559
  • Source generators don't run when a file in AdditionalFiles is deleted #60455
    17.3
  • Usings via compilation options should bring source types into scope #61502
    C# 11.0
  • Delegates with nint types in the signature don't get NativeIntegerAttributes anymore #61525
    C# 11.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge Required Members to main #61571
    Area-Compilers
  • EnC: Allow adding/removing await expressions and yield statements in VB #61569
    Area-Compilers
  • Include local-functions in the go-to index. #61568
    Area-IDE
  • InlineHintsTagger: Fix assumption that GetSpans will retrieve a length greater than 0 #61567
    Area-IDE
  • Add some APIs on AspNetCoreVirtualCharSequence #61554
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main to features/required-members #61570
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Merge main to features/required-members #61565
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61566
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Change natural type of UTF-8 string literals to `ReadOnlySpan<byte>` and null terminate the underlying blob. #61532
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals, Next
  • IDE Support for Required Members #61440
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61552
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Final prototype comments and top level statements local adjustments #61551
    Area-Compilers

Updated

  • Support 'scoped' modifier for parameters and locals #61389
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Add Move Static Member To Existing Type #61519
    Area-IDE
  • Mask count in shift operations on native integers #61341
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int
  • EnC: Allow adding/removing await expressions and yield statements #61356
    Area-Compilers, 17.3
  • EnC: Implements support for adding and removing await/yield return in C# - IDE #61521
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix VB compiler crashes when decoding attributes #61537
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Bind native integers in cref #61431
    Area-Compilers
  • Add tool window #61499
    Area-Compilers
  • Use RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan for array initialization with relevant primitives #61414
    Area-Compilers
  • File types binding #60977
    Area-Compilers
  • Add helper for source generators to filter to nodes with attribute matching an attribute name #61293
    Area-Compilers
  • Semantic Snippets - Remove reflection and call the LanguageServerSnippetExpander directly #61491
    Area-IDE
  • Remove invalid implicit downcast #19932
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove unused private members #61064
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update 'Rename's commit behavior to be async. #61549
    Area-IDE
  • Find implementation assemblies for reference assemblies in the .NET SDK #61526
    Area-IDE
  • Organize contributing notes and add WSL testing section #61408
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix cancellation leaks #20111
    Area-IDE, cla-already-signed, PR For Personal Review Only

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add access to services for route handler filter factories to RouteHandlerContext #41900
  • Add overloads for validation problem results that accept IReadOnlyDictionary<string, string[]> #41899
  • Why HashPassword method inside Identity PasswordHasher<T> class has TUser as a parameter ? #41898
  • Detected package version outside of dependency constraint: Duende.IdentityServer.EntityFramework.Storage 5.2.0 #41897
  • Add Http/2 WebSocket HttpClient interop tests #41895
  • Quarantine H3 Client Cert optional tests #41894
  • Update project templates to use WebApplicationBuilder.Authentication #41893
  • Inconsistent `crossgen2` build failures #41891
  • Project Template of "ASP.NET Core and React.js" shall add an option for TypeScript #41890
    Backlog
  • Make Web API Analyzers part of the default template #41889
  • Authentication follow-ups #41888
    7.0-preview6
  • `TryUpdateModelAsync()` doesn't account for Nullable Reference Types in navigation properties of the model #41886
  • Help on #41471 use my own NewtonsoftJsonInputFormatter #41883

Closed

  • Security vulnerability reported for event source package #41892
  • Disable authenticator app #41420
    Discussions
  • Enable an XSS Prefix to JSON formatted output. #41848
  • Hot reload for Blazor Web Assembly in VS 17.2.0 does not work #41681
    6.0.x
  • [Feature request] Office 365 + Blazor = perfect add-in framework #41885
  • Link in gRPC template creating a client support points to .NET Core 3.0 tutorial #41852
  • [SDK] Static web assets pack improvements #36880
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [Blazor] pass custom class parameter to page #41828
    Discussions
  • Issue when binding DateTime to input type="time" #41731
    6.0.x
  • [Migration] Figure out a story for sharing session state with ASP.NET apps #40079
    .NET 7 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Add a new route to sample app that display OS and .NET versions #41901
    area-runtime
  • Update duende versions to 6.1 #41896
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix time/datetime-local binding with seconds when there's no step attribute #41868
    Done, area-blazor, 7.0-preview6

Updated

  • Implement Http/2 WebSockets #41558
    area-runtime
  • Add dotnet user-jwts tool and runtime support #41520
    area-commandlinetools
  • (Corrected) Generate Full Composite Images of .NET and ASP.NET Bundled Together #41855
    area-infrastructure
  • Adding WebTransport Handshake to Kestrel #41877
    area-runtime
  • Handle spaces after request line #41823
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.7
  • DataProtection use 6.0 app discriminator trailing slash format #41849
    area-dataprotection
  • Updated Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.PublicApiAnalyzers to latest stable #41115
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix the RedirectHandler (in Mvc.Testing) for relative URIs #41742
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Backport 41868 to release/6.0 #41870
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0.x
  • Update SDK #41798
    area-infrastructure
  • Convert all possible `DllImport`s to `LibraryImport` for .NET 7+ #41573
    area-runtime
  • Enable trim analyzer #41683
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • No icon generated for older Android Devices #7556
  • [IOS bug] string.Replace always returns null #7555
  • Resizetizer has an empty error with an invalid file name #7554
  • [iOS] Shell.SearchHandler crashes the app #7553
  • [IOS] Make MauiWebViewNavigationDelegate public methods virtual #7551
  • Migrate Android Shell over to using all the same platform structures as non-shell #7550
    .NET 7
  • Incompatible ButtonHandler when embedding MAUI page in .NET Android-project #7549
  • Move Compatibility Project out to a separate nuget/workload #7548
    .NET 7
  • Changing Button Background and TextColor in Pressed and Released events not Updating Properly[Windows] #7543
  • Give developers more (full) control over control colors #7542
  • [BUG IOS] Cancel prompt in WebView will crash the app #7541
  • [Windows] Border removes child when using Line, PolyLine, Polygon as StrokeShape #7538
  • VerticalOptions doesn't work inside a layout. #7537
  • Verify all open issues from Xamarin.Forms in MAUI #7536
  • Arrange on Layouts not respecting correctly the passed bounding Rect #7535
  • $SolutionDir incorrectly maps to $ProjectDir when deploying to iOS (simulator) #7534
  • Measure not working correctly on Layouts with fixed size constraints #7531
  • No documentation for Maui-specific tags introduced in .csproj projects #7525
  • Border does not grow when editor inside it grows #7524
  • ScrollView Orientation dynamic change not working in Android #7523
  • GotoAsync not working after executing PushModalAsync in .Net MAUI #7522
  • [Bug] Strange Border with StrokeThickness and Clipped Content #7521
  • FlyoutPage issues in Android and iOS Tablets #7520

Closed

  • [Android] ListView crashes when navigating to another tab and back #7513
  • Not able to switch simulator when enabling MAUI embedding in .NET iOS-project #7540
  • can maui execute code using interperter mode for upload app to appstore? #7516
  • Bring back TabbedPageRenderer on WinUI #1332
  • ListView crashes on scrolling through 9,100 items #7530
  • IOS does not work with Blazor app and SQL Lite #7529
  • [Android]: Prevent Entry from losing focus when touch to another child of the ViewGroup is performed #5916
    6.0.300-servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • Propagate semantics to CV Item container #7539
    area/collectionview 📃, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • Bump System.Memory from 4.5.4 to 4.5.5 #7533
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.12.0.8 to 4.13.2 #7532
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Android] Fix issue with CheckBox colors #7527
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • [iOS] Expose ApplicationSignificantTimeChange method in lifecycle events #7526
    area/lifecycle 🔁, platform/iOS 🍎, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • Just a small styling error I noticed just now #7519
    area/templates 📄, 6.0.3xx-sr1

Merged

  • Set GenerateDocumentationFile=true for Compatibility and Xaml and pack a special docs artifact #7511
    area/docs 📓
  • If the FlyoutBehavior is "Flyout" show toolbar #7544
    area/shell 🐢, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #7517
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Merge the PublicAPI checker into main #7339
    p/0, area/infrastructure 🏗️, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • Align the controls used in the different templates #7439
    area/templates 📄, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • Return VER for PlatformView #7509
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Fix Button CornerRadius issue #7215
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • [iOS] Clip Border content based on StrokeShape property #7335
    area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • Avoid crash with invalid cast using RadioButtonGroup.GroupName with a View #7438
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • Better handle disappearing content with ViewPager2 #7425
    area/shell 🐢
  • Fill ScrollView when content is smaller than viewport #7514
    area/layout 🔲
  • [Android] Correctly notify CheckBox Color changes #7084
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TableExpressionBase implements IMutableAnnotatable making it mutable expression #28120
  • DefaultIfEmpty() unsupported in subquery when main query has group by? #28119
  • EF Core does not work for IOS when using SQLite #28117
  • No-Relational Provider #28114
  • dotnet ef migrations bundle build fails when there is more than one project file #28113

Closed

  • Use GetDiscriminatorValue for TPT and TPC in queries #28054
    7.0.0
  • EF Core 6 fails to detect specified discriminator #28069
  • Query Does Not Return Included Entity After Execution #28053
  • Using custom entity Id type results in blocking select query without any error #28040
  • EF Core fails to track property if it's set up as JSON #28109
  • Is there any way to add key annotations in cs files generated from Grpc proto files? #28112

PullRequests

Created

  • MSSQL Spatial: Add EF.Functions.CurveToLine #28118
  • Translate spatial aggregates #28115

Merged

  • Query: Use GetDiscriminatorValue for TPT and TPC #28070
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Update some NuGet packages #28090
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Query: Add TPCTableSplittingTests #28061
  • SqlServer: Throw for split query with skip without order by #28056
    auto-merge
  • Custom aggregate translations #28110

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-27
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Marcpop msft removepostinstall #13883
  • Darc release/7.0.1xx preview5 551194fe 5740 4feb 8378 7b41205b6875 #13882

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #13880
  • Update GenerateBundledVersions.targets #13879
  • Update GenerateBundledVersions.targets #13878
